headline: Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff Just Delivered Fantastic News for Palantir Investors
summary: By poking fun at Palantir's soaring valuation and high prices, the Salesforce CEO may have validated the bull case for the stock.

headline: Buy the Dip in These 2 Underperforming Cloud Software Stocks, Say Analysts
summary: Stocks can see their prices fall for lots of reasons, and not all of them should scare away investors. Increased competition, a changing market, shifting sentiment and tough macroeconomic conditions can push shares down, even as the company remains fundamentally sound. And a fundamentally sound stock on a dip is frequently seen as an opportunity for investors. The challenge lies in distinguishing between short-term declines and deeper structural problems. That’s not a simple task, but investors

headline: How Fastbreak AI is solving the complex riddle of pro sports league scheduling

headline: Smaller Discounts and Earlier Sales: What to Expect this Holiday Season

headline: Jim Cramer on Salesforce: “They’ve Got a Terrific Business”
summary: Salesforce, Inc. (NYSE:CRM) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently shared his thoughts on. A caller asked Cramer for his thoughts on the stock after taking a large position, and noted the stock’s underperformance year-to-date.
